alert.note: Alert for Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 27 at 5:19PM PDT until July 27 at 6:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Nevada and southern Nevada, including the following counties, in south central Nevada, Nye. In southern Nevada, Clark. * WHEN...Until 830 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 519 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Mile markers 27 thru 43 on Highway 160. - Mile markers 27 thru 43 on Highway 160. is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pahrump. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
